title: Transat adds 12 resorts and seven destinations to its Sun Savvy CollectionTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Transat adds 12 resorts and seven destinations to its Sun Savvy Collection
Transat is pleased to announce that it has added 12 resorts in seven new destinations to its Sun Savvy Collection. The collection, which is specifically designed to offer quality vacations at affordable prices, now includes 31 hotels in 21 sun destinations.
Savvy travellers eager for sun and fun on their vacations are sure to enjoy the wide range of 3 ½ to 4-star resorts, 19 of which are exclusive to Transat in Canada, available in Cuba, the Dominican Republic, Mexico, Jamaica, Costa Rica, St. Martin/St. Maarten, Honduras, Nicaragua, Colombia and Haiti. The collection’s new destinations include San Jose in Costa Rica, Holguin in Cuba, Puerto Vallarta and Los Cabos in Mexico as well as Samana, La Romana and Santo Domingo in the Dominican Republic.
What’s more, there has never been a better time to book a vacation that offers excellent satisfaction rates and a friendly atmosphere. Travellers who book a Sun Savvy Collection package with a deposit of only $100 by September 30, 2015 will save up to $550 per couple, be assured of having a vacation that meets their expectations and benefit from exclusive advantages such as travel date changes permitted up to three hours before departure. This offer is valid on bookings made by September 30, 2015 for travel between December 18, 2015 and April 30, 2016.
